PPod

Interface PPodContract

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PPod

    public interface PPodContract

    ESTG - Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão
    IPP - Instituto Politécnico do Porto
    LEI - Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática
    PP - Paradigmas de Programação

    Descrição:
    Class that represents the contract that every PPod has to follow

      • playTrack

        void playTrack(int index)
        Tries to play the track on the index position. The playing of the track is simply printing his name and lenght on the screen.
        Parameters:
        index - Position of the Track to play
